meanings.sent1: During exercise, his tachycardia was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with tachycardia after the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The race car's tachycardia made it zoom past the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The city pulsed with the tachycardia of rush hour traffic.

meanings.definition: Condition characterized by a fast heart rate.
meanings.sent1: Her condition of tachycardia required regular monitoring.
meanings.sent2: The hospital treated many patients with tachycardia.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah's tachycardia helped it win the race effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room created a tachycardia of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The tachycardia of the storm matched the intensity of the thunder.

meanings.sent1: His tachycardia was a result of the caffeine intake.
